Class PropertySet

A set of Properties in a DataModel.

See Data for usage examples.

Summary
  • Belongs to a DataModel
  • Registered by PropertySet.id in DataModel.propertySets
  • Created with {@link Data.createPropertySet} or DataModel.createPropertySet
  • Has Property components in PropertySet.properties

  • PropertySet

Readonly dataModel

dataModel: DataModel
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/data/PropertySet.ts:23

The DataModel to which this PropertySet belongs.

Readonly id

id: string
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/data/PropertySet.ts:30

Unique ID.

PropertySet instances are registered by this ID in {@link Data#propertySets} and {@link DataModel#propertySets}.

Readonly name

name: string
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/data/PropertySet.ts:40

Human-readable name of this PropertySet.

Optional Readonly originalSystemId

originalSystemId: string
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/data/PropertySet.ts:35

ID of the corresponding object within the originating system, if any.
